CustomField.formula: IF( Employee__r.Manager__c = $User.Id, "Manager", IF( Employee__r.Supervisor__c = $User.Id, "Supervisor", IF( Employee__r.SF_User__c = $User.Id, "Me", "None" ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Notes the relationship to the employee, of the user currently looking at it, based on what's selected in "Manager", "Supervisor" and "SF User" on the Employee record.
CustomField.label: Relation to Employee
